title: Observable
description: Specifies the object to be observed for a price, it could be an asset or a reference.

Asset.description: The object to be observed is an Asset, ie something that can be owned and transferred in the financial markets.

Basket.description: The object to be observed is a Basket, ie a collection of Observables with an identifier and optional weightings.

Index.description: The object to be observed is an Index, ie an observable computed on the prices, rates or valuations of a number of assets.
